The Athenaeum in Athens has announced that it will host a new exhibition dedicated to nineteenth-century Italian painting, drawing, and design. Titled “Thee Modern Way” and curated by the Italian director Cesare Prada, the show will examine the visual and material arts through the eyes of two artists: Giacomo Marzio and Piet Mondrian.
